message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'd be comfortable with. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11,000?
